verbose_text: Both Tfap2c and Cdx2 can override the self-renewal-promoting effect of the pluripotency genes induced by Stat3 and induce mESC differentiation towards the TE lineage (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Tfap2c and Cdx2 can override the self-renewal-promoting effect of the pluripotency genes induced by Stat3 and induce mESC differentiation
